banner.safety_message: For greater security when sending your documents, be sure to navigate to the official DocPort website

feature1.title: Performance
feature1.description: By relying solely on modern technologies, we can offer you optimal results.

feature2.title: Privacy
feature2.description: Only necessary information is collected, and files are deleted after their use or expiration.

feature3.title: No Intermediaries
feature3.description: We do not involve any intermediaries; you are in direct contact with the technologies used.

feature4.title: Security
feature4.description: Security is at the core of our concerns, and we make every effort to provide you with a secure service.

feature5.title: 24/7 Support
feature5.description: We are here to listen, answer your questions, and assist you with your use around the clock.

q1.title: What is DocPort used for?
q1.description: This service allows you to upload documents to a shared folder that will be reused by the Moulinette service. This greatly facilitates, for example, taking photos and transferring them to the technician's workstation.

q2.title: Who can create a folder?
q2.description: Only an authorized Moulinette user has the capability to create a folder.

q3.title: Who can add documents to a folder?
q3.description: Anyone in possession of the folder link can add documents.

q4.title: Who can access the documents in a folder?
q4.description: Only an authorized Moulinette user has the capability to view the documents in a folder.

q5.title: What are the limitations?
q5.description: The limitations are set by the creator of the respective DocPort.

hero.description: It was time to create a file-sharing system that works for your team and your customers, easily and securely.

qrcode.popover: You can click here and scan the QR code to send files from your phone to this folder.
qrcode.title: QR Code
qrcode.description: Scan this QR code from your phone camera app, Snapchat or any other QR code scanner to send files to this folder.
